arm_group.description: Patients will recieved ivabradine(5) 1 tab bid pc for 3 day and the day of CT, and recieve placebo of metoprolol
Metoprolol (100) 1/2 tab bid pc for 3 day and the day of CT coronary , and placebo of ivabradine

brief_summary.textblock: Ivabradine may be better than Metoprolol for controlling heart rate before Coronary CTA.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Efficacy of Ivabradine Versus Metoprolol

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  elective patient on scheduled for 640 slices CT coronary at Phramonkutklao hospital

          -  Resting heart rate > 70 BPM

          -  age > 18 years and informed consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Heart rate > 100 BPM

          -  BP <100/60 mmHg

          -  recent congestive heart failure in 1 mo.

          -  SA node, AV node disease and AF

          -  on permanent pacemaker

          -  CrCL < 15ml/min. , AST or ALT > 3x UNL

          -  on HR reducing drug such as diltiazem, verapamil, digitalis

          -  contraindication for ivabradine or metoprolol

clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Efficacy and Safety of Ivabradine Versus Metoprolol for Controlling Heart Rate Prior to 640-Slice Computed Tomographic Angiography in Elective Patients

overall_official.affiliation: Phramongkutklao College of Medicine and Hospital

primary_outcome.measure: Heart rate of patient before CT coronary

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Phramongkutklao College of Medicine and Hospital

secondary_outcome.measure: safety and side effect of Metoprolol and Ivabradine

clinical_study.source: Phramongkutklao College of Medicine and Hospital

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver), Primary Purpose: Diagnostic
